SELECT A1.BUYID, A1.BUYDATE, A1.BUYGUBUN, A1.MANAGENO, A1.CITYCODE, A1.CITYNAME, A1.BOROUGHCODE, A1.BOROUGHNAME, A1.USETYPE, A1.ADDRESS, A1.OWNERNAME, fn_formatnum('I', A1.OWNERJUMINID) AS OWNERJUMINID, A1.BUYM2, A1.BUYPY, A1.CONJM2, A1.BUNJANM2, A1.BUNJANPY, A1.BUYAMT, A1.BUYDANGA, A1.PMDANGA, A1.REGYN, A1.REGDATE, A1.REMARK FROM ( SELECT T1.BUYID, T1.BUYDATE, T1.BUYGUBUN, T1.MANAGENO, T1.CITYCODE, (SELECT CITYNAME FROM ba_citymst WHERE CITYCODE = T1.CITYCODE) AS CITYNAME, T1.BOROUGHCODE, (SELECT BOROUGHNAME FROM ba_citydtl WHERE CITYCODE = T1.CITYCODE AND BOROUGHCODE = T1.BOROUGHCODE) AS BOROUGHNAME, T1.USETYPE, T1.ADDRESS, T1.OWNERNAME, T1.OWNERJUMINID, T1.BUYM2, T1.BUYPY,
CAST(( IFNULL(T1.BUYM2, 0) - ( (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN1.CONM2), 0) FROM sa_salemst IN1 LEFT OUTER JOIN sa_salehistorytb IN2 ON IN1.SALEID = IN2.SALEID WHERE IN1.BUYID = T1.BUYID AND IN1.SALEGUBUN != '003' AND (IN2.CHGGUBUN != '004' OR IN2.CHGGUBUN IS NULL)) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN1.CONM2), 0) FROM sa_salemst IN1 INNER JOIN sa_salebdtl IN2 ON IN1.SALEID = IN2.SALEID WHERE IN1.BUYID = T1.BUYID AND IN1.SALEGUBUN = '003' AND (IN2.CANCELYN = 'N' AND IN2.EXPIREYN = 'N')) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IN1.HOLDINGM2), 0) FROM mm_salesopentb IN1 WHERE IN1.BUYID = T1.BUYID) ) ) AS DECIMAL(12, 2)) AS CONJM2, '' BUNJANM2, '' BUNJANPY, T1.BUYAMT, T1.BUYDANGA, T1.PMDANGA, T1.REGYN, T1.REGDATE, T1.REMARK FROM mm_buymst T1 ) A1 WHERE 1=1
AND A1.BUYDATE BETWEEN #LS_BUYDATE_FR# AND #LS_BUYDATE_TO#
AND A1.CONJM2 > 0
AND A1.ADDRESS LIKE '%$LS_ADDRESS$%'
order by A1.BUYDATE
